document.full_text: david pocock, a professional for the western force in super rugby, has set up a charity to help fund development projects in zimbabwe, which his family left a decade ago after their farm was seized.
document.title: rugby: rugby player tackles social needs in zimbabwe
lines_and_colors: david pocock, a professional for the western force in super rugby, has set up a charity to help fund development projects in zimbabwe, which his family left a decade ago after their farm was seized.
